clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text: These services are operated in the United States, and are certified under the EU-US Privacy Shield agreement, which provides safeguards intended to be equivalent to those provided in the EU.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: It is your responsibility to check the Terms of Use periodically for changes. Your continued use of the Service following the posting of any changes to the Terms of Use constitutes acceptance of those changes.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: This service throttles your use
clauses.description: The service may impose limits or restrictions to the use of the service, thus negatively impacting users experience. They may do so without reason or prior notice.
clauses.clause_text: Brave may also impose limits on certain features and services or restrict your access to parts or all of the Service without notice or liability.

case.text: Your use is throttled

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user or $500
clauses.clause_text: (III) FOR ANY DIRECT DAMAGES IN EXCESS (IN THE AGGREGATE) OF THE FEES PAID BY YOU FOR THE SERVICE OR, IF GREATER, $500.

case.text: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text: No data that identifies you or that can be linked to you as an individual leaves the Brave browser on your device.

case.text: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You can ask to know what information we have about you, update incorrect information, delete it, object to our use of it, or get a copy of it.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: IP addresses of users are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text: Your IP address will not be stored by Brave, but it may be stored by the website you have visited.

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: An onion site accessible over Tor is provided
clauses.description: Tor is a software for anonymous communication that directs Internet traffic through an overlay network. Onion sites are only available through Tor browser and provide additional security and anonymity to users.

case.text: An onion site accessible over Tor is provided

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text:
This always includes:

  • your name, email address, and phone number;
  • your business’s name and mailing address;
  • the domain name(s) to which your ads will direct people who see them. and
  • billing information needed to process payment.

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text: >When you establish an advertiser account with us, we will ask you for the information we need to validate your identity and to bill you for advertising services.

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text: You can contact our data protection officer and the rest of our privacy team at privacy@brave.com.

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
clauses.clause_text:
Returns

All of our products are print-on-demand and therefore cannot be exchanged or returned for a refund under normal circumstances. We can only replace or refund defective, damaged, or lost-in-transit orders.

case.text: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: If you’re in the European Union, you also have the right to complain to your local data protection authority

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: If you wish to terminate your account, you may do so by following the instructions on the Service.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: The service provides a free help desk
clauses.description: The service can be easily contacted for questions or provides a support center at no extra cost.
clauses.clause_text: For support, please visit community.brave.com.

case.text: A free help desk is provided

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
clauses.clause_text: You shall defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Brave, its affiliates and each of its, and its affiliates employees, contractors, directors, suppliers and representatives from all liabilities, losses, claims, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys’ fees, that arise from or relate to (i) your use or misuse of, or access to, the Service, or (ii) your violation of the Terms of Use or any applicable law, contract, policy, regulation or other obligation.

case.text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: IN NO EVENT SHALL BRAVE OR ITS DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, PARTNERS, SUPPLIERS OR CONTENT PROVIDERS, BE LIABLE UNDER CONTRACT, TORT, STRICT LIABILITY, NEGLIGENCE OR ANY OTHER LEGAL OR EQUITABLE THEORY WITH RESPECT TO THE SERVICE (I) FOR ANY LOST PROFITS, DATA LOSS, COST OF PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES, OR SPECIAL, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, PUNITIVE, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OF ANY KIND WHATSOEVER, OR SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES,

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text:
Terms of Use Effective Date:
July 14, 2020

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text: Brave reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace any of the Terms of Use, or change, suspend, or discontinue the Service (including without limitation, the availability of any feature, database, or content) at any time by posting a notice on the Brave websites or Service or by sending you an email.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination
clauses.clause_text: Upon any termination, all rights and licenses granted to you in this Agreement shall immediately terminate, but all provisions hereof which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, warranty disclaimers, indemnity and limitations of liability.

case.text: Defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination

clauses.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.
clauses.clause_text: By way of example, and not as a limitation, you shall not (and shall not permit any third party to) take any action (including contributing any Content) that: [...] constitutes unauthorized or unsolicited advertising, junk or bulk e-mail."

case.text: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

clauses.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text: By way of example, and not as a limitation, you shall not (and shall not permit any third party to) take any action (including contributing any Content) that: [...] is threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, libelous, deceptive, fraudulent, invasive of another’s privacy, tortious, obscene, offensive, or profane."

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text:
ALL USE OF THE SERVICE AND ANY CONTENT IS UNDERTAKEN ENTIRELY AT YOUR OWN RISK.
THE SERVICE (INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, THE BRAVE BROWSER AND ANY CONTENT) IS PROVIDED “AS IS” AND “AS AVAILABLE”

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
clauses.clause_text:

case.text: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

clauses.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.
clauses.clause_text: "By way of example, and not as a limitation, you shall not (and shall not permit any third party to) take any action (including contributing any Content) that:[...] is [...] tortious, obscene, offensive, or profane. "

case.text: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

clauses.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
clauses.description: The content you have published on the service may be removed if it infringes copyright.
clauses.clause_text:
It is Brave’s policy to (1) block access to or remove material that it believes in good faith to be copyrighted material that has been illegally copied and distributed by any of our advertisers, affiliates, content providers, members or users.
and (2) remove and discontinue service to repeat offenders.

case.text: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

clauses.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.
clauses.clause_text:
Brave runs these forums, and they are hosted on its behalf by Civilized Discourse Construction Kit.
Their privacy policy describes how they use your data to host the forum for us.

case.text: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: Even with Brave Rewards enabled, we never collect your browsing history or similar information, and we can’t derive this information from your contributions to content creators and sites. Instead, we aggregate contributions among all Brave users, and we cannot trace contributions to individual users, or link any of your contributions together.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties
clauses.description: In this context third-parties refers to anyone including friends, family, or company
clauses.clause_text: The Terms of Use are personal to you, and are not assignable or transferable by you except with Brave’s prior written consent.

case.text: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

clauses.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
clauses.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.
clauses.clause_text: The failure of either party to exercise in any respect any right provided for herein shall not be deemed a waiver of any further rights hereunder.

case.text: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

clauses.title: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim
clauses.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.
clauses.clause_text: If you believe in good faith that any Content made available in connection with the Service infringes your copyright, you (or your agent) may send us a notice requesting that the Content be removed, or access to it blocked as set forth below (see https://www.copyright.gov/ for further details).

case.text: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: If any provision of the Terms of Use is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that the Terms of Use will otherwise remain in full force and effect and enforceable.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: By way of example, and not as a limitation, you shall not (and shall not permit any third party to) take any action (including contributing any Content) that: would constitute a violation of any applicable law, rule or regulation.

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements
clauses.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.
clauses.clause_text: WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF TITLE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND ANY WARRANTIES IMPLIED BY ANY COURSE OF PERFORMANCE OR USAGE OF TRADE, ALL OF WHICH ARE EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMED.

case.text: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

clauses.title: This service employs separate policies for different parts of the service
clauses.description: The user may need to read additional product-specific agreements depending on the way the service is used.
clauses.clause_text:
Read this document to understand how the Brave Browser uses data.

To learn how we use data to operate our websites, forums, and communications, visit the Website Privacy Policy. To learn how we use data for publishers and creators visit the Publisher Privacy Policy on the Basic Attention Token website

case.text: Separate policies are employed for different parts of the service

clauses.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: If you switch on Brave Rewards you are assigned a “wallet” identifier by Uphold, our payments partner. We record this identifier on servers operated by Amazon and Heroku (a Salesforce company) in the United States.

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: Each time Brave sends users a monthly gift of BAT it makes a record of their IP addresses that can be analysed to safeguard against fraud.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
